attributes.action: Review tax on 'Court made divorce maintenance provision' for estranged partners.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Allow the Divorce Court to make a GROSS TAX FREE provision that the recieving parent then has to pay tax on (Based as part of total income).
Thus making resident parents (not paying tax or at the basic rate), whose ex-partners are paying 40% tax, getting a fairer deal, but making the non resident partner no worse off from the court order.

Eg £600 order by court but £400 has already been paid in tax.
But if £1000 passed to ex, then £230 would be paid in tax (by ex). Therefore ex better off by 17% or 40% at best.
